name: Sewer Skirmish (Cammin)
description:
A 3D puzzle shooter where you must use your "tool gun" to interact with platforms to advance the levels.

WASD to move, Left shift to run(eventually required).
Left mouse button to shoot, right mouse button (or scroll wheel) to zoom.

Final Project for my Intro to Game Programming Class; Created over the duration of roughly 3 weeks, from Nov 29th to Dec 18th of 2018.

...And yes, I know that the title name is associated with battle/military, but ah well.
